title: Writing the Right Endpoint
text: Since the inequality includes a less than or equal to symbol, $$ \leq $$, we will need to use a bracket to denote the right endpoint.

title: Writing the Left Endpoint
text: There is no lower end to the solution to this inequality so we express it using the $$\infty$$ symbol.

title: Displaying Final Interval Notation
text: What is the interval notation for the inequality?
